backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of key frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing active tab state and rendering corresponding feature views.
frontend/src/components/mediaai/MediaAiS: Layout shell with collapsible sidebar, dynamic header, and main content area for tabs.
frontend/src/components/mediaai/SidebarN: Button component for sidebar navigation with active and collapsed states.
frontend/src/features/image-maker/compon: Full-screen editing overlay showing selected image, edit prompt, suggestions, and save/cancel actions.
Responsive grid displaying generated images with hover actions and selection handling.
Renders a button to fetch edit suggestions and displays suggestion chips that trigger a callback when clicked.
frontend/src/features/image-maker/ImageM: Image Maker view handling prompt input, image generation, gallery management, and editor overlay logic.
frontend/src/features/video-studio/Video: UI for a video slideshow creator with placeholder handlers for adding photos and generating a video.
frontend/src/features/voice-over/VoiceOv: Provides an interface to generate a voiceover script via a stub and preview audio with non-functional UI controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context provider and hook for managing authentication state and AuthClient setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file noting that backend data operations are handled client-side.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, and forces dark mode by default.
frontend/src/lib/aiStubs.ts: Local stub functions simulating AI prompt enhancement, image generation, and edit suggestions without external API calls.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, providing QueryClient and InternetIdentity context.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, plugins, and extensive OKLCH-based color definitions.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, architectural notes, and a list of implemented features for the MediaAI React app. Defines current project capabilities, versioning, and build requirements without code.
